title: Canada - average working hours per week 2019
yAxis: Number of employed person in thousands
summary: This is a bar chart representing Average usual weekly hours in the x axis and Number of employed person in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of employed person in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Average usual weekly hours 40 hours and lowest at Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.
The highest Average usual weekly hours 40 hours has 6238.3 more Number of employed person in thousands than the lowest Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employed person in thousands for 7 number of Average usual weekly hourss.
The Number of employed person in thousands is highest at Average usual weekly hours 40 hours and lowest at Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Average usual weekly hours in the x axis and Number of employed person in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of employed person in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Average usual weekly hours 40 hours and lowest at Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.
The highest Average usual weekly hours 40 hours has 6238.3 more Number of employed person in thousands than the lowest Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Average usual weekly hours, and Number of employed person in thousands in each Average usual weekly hours on the y axis.
Average usual weekly hours 40 hours has the highest Number of employed person in thousands and 41 to 49 hours has the lowest Number of employed person in thousands.
Average usual weekly hours 35 to 39 hours has the second highest value for Number of employed person in thousands.
There is a difference of 6238.3 between the maximum Average usual weekly hours 40 hours and minimum Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.

Average usual weekly hours 40 hours is higher than any other Average usual weekly hourss with value 7282.5, followed by 35 to 39 hours, and 15 to 29 hours. Down to Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours with the lowest value 1044.2.
The average Number of employed person in thousands in all 7 Average usual weekly hourss is 2722.23.
Summing up the values of all Average usual weekly hourss, we get total 19055.6.
